question: Term used to specify places in the architecture that capture the variation in a product line...
Too narrow scoping in a software product line will result in...
options: Insufficient number of products to justify investment
Effort to develop individual products will be too great

question: Architectural support for variation in software product line includes...
options: Inclusion or omission of variation points
Selection of version of elements with same interface
Inclusion of different number of replicated elements

question: What makes software product lines difficult?
options: Always increases the risk for an organization
Adoption of product line approach in organization
Cannot be designed in a software architecture

question: How can variation in software product lines be implemented in code?
options: Overload named functionality to operate on different types

question: One software product line may vary in terms of:
